item.text: Finally, pray for us, brothers and sisters, that the Lord’s message may spread quickly and be honored as in fact it was among you,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> we may be <st data-num="4506" class="">delivered</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="824" class="">perverse</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>. <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> have <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="4103" class="">faithful</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3739">he</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="4741" class="">strengthen</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5442" class="">protect</st> you <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4190">evil one</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> we are <st data-num="3982" class="">confident</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">about</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you are <st data-num="2532" class="">both</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st>—<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st>—<st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> we are <st data-num="3853" class="">commanding</st>.
Now may the Lord direct your hearts toward the love of God and the endurance of Christ.
But we command you, brothers and sisters, in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, to keep away from any brother who lives an undisciplined life and not according to the tradition they received from us.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> you <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="846" class="">yourselves</st> <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> you <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="3401" class="">imitate</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> we did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="812">behave without discipline</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>,

<st data-num="3761">and</st> we did <st data-num="3761">not</st> <st data-num="2068">eat</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone’s</st> <st data-num="740" class="">food</st> <st data-num="1432">without paying</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">Instead</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2873" class="">toil</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3449" class="">drudgery</st> we <st data-num="2038" class="">worked</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="4314">in order</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="1912" class="">burden</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">any</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

It was <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> we do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> that <st data-num="1849" class="">right</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2443">to</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">ourselves</st> as an <st data-num="5179" class="">example</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3401" class="">imitate</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2532">even</st> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> we <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, we used to <st data-num="3853" class="">give</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3778">this</st> <st data-num="3853" class="">command:</st> “<st data-num="1487">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">willing</st> to <st data-num="2038" class="">work</st>, <st data-num="3366" class="">neither</st> should he <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st>.”

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> we <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> that <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="4043" class="">living</st> an <st data-num="814">undisciplined life</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3367" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2038" class="">doing</st> their own <st data-num="2038" class="">work</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4020">meddling in the work of others</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="5108">such people</st> we <st data-num="3853" class="">command</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3870" class="">urge</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2443">to</st> <st data-num="2038" class="">work</st> <st data-num="2271" class="">quietly</st> and so provide <st data-num="1438">their own</st> <st data-num="740" class="">food</st> to <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st>,<n id="1" /> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1573" class="">grow weary</st> in <st data-num="2569">doing what is right</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> does <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="5219" class="">obey</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1992" class="">letter</st>, <st data-num="4593">take note</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> and do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4874">associate closely with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> he may be <st data-num="1788" class="">ashamed</st>.
Yet do not regard him as an enemy, but admonish him as a brother.
Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times and in every way. The Lord be with you all.

I, <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st>, <st data-num="1125" class="">write</st> this <st data-num="783" class="">greeting</st> with <st data-num="1699">my own</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3779" class="">how</st> I <st data-num="1125" class="">write</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="1992" class="">letter</st>.<n id="1" />
The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all.
